channel.title: 🏢 Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences, New York University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences, New York University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: The surprising efficiency of temporal difference learning for rare event prediction
item.description: TD learning surprisingly outperforms Monte Carlo methods for rare event prediction in Markov chains, achieving relative accuracy with polynomially, instead of exponentially, many observed transitions.
